ComicInfo.Series: Jademan Opens: The Gates of the Night
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Bridal Lake: There's a pond where 14 people have drowned, all male. There's a reason for this...
The Queen's Square Statue: Blood activates a stature with murderous intent.
Bridge Of No Return: A trip to the park becomes mixed with a horror of the Japanese occupancy of Hong Kong during World War II.
The Living Corpse: Can there be a fair deal between the lving and the dead?
Trailer Of The Night: A soul desperately seeks the opportunity for reincarnation.
Prisoners Of The Sea: How the sea reclaims people.
Spirit From The Fire: Spirits from a fire in 1964 return to haunt the present.
ComicInfo.Title: The Bridal Lake; The Queen's Square Statue; Bridge Of No Return; The Living Corpse; Trailer Of The Night; Prisoners Of The Sea; Spirit From The Fire
